https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Two aimless Jersey boy best friends are fired from their cushy porn-shop jobs and decide to become superheroes for hire in order to attain financial stability after accidentally saving someone's life. With help from a "professional" crime fighter, they find that being a hero isn't always super. 28 Minute Epic
